pageProduct.name: Optrex Advance Actimist Preservative Free Dry Eye Spray 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Optrex Advance Preservative Free Eye Spray for Dry Eyes

Modern living (such as computer work and air conditioning), pollen in the air, ageing and contact lens wear can cause the eye's natural protective moisture barrier to break up, leaving your eyes feeling dry.

Optrex Advance Actimist Preservative Free Eye Spray gives you lasting relief in a quick easy spray:

• Rebalances the eye's natural protective moisture barrier

• Helps to moisturise the eye

• Is quick & easy to apply - just spray on closed eyes anytime, anywhere to cool & soothe without having to touch your eye

• Can be applied when wearing eye makeup^.

• Suitable for everyday use.

^when sprayed once 20cm from your closed eyelid.

INGREDIENTS

Liposomal Eye Spray

1ml contains: 10mg Lecithin, 8mg Sodium Chloride, 8mg Ethanol, 0.25mg Vitamin A Palmitate, 0.02mg Vitamin E, Purified water.

STORAGE

Keep out of sight and reach of children.

Store between 2 and 25 °C.

Protect from sunlight.

Discard 6 months after opening. Do not use after expiry date.

ONLY FOR USE ON THE EYES

* Dry eyes due to disturbed lipid layer of the tear film, approx. 80% of dry eye cases.

Spray on closed eyes.

Always read the label.

Suitable For: Suitable for daily use and use with contact lenses.

Boxed Contents: Approx 100 doses.

Size: 10mL

KEY FEATURES

• Rebalances the eye's natural tear film
• Cools, soothes and refreshes
• Helps moisturise the eye
• Suitable for daily use and use with contact lenses
• Can be applied wearing eye makeup, when sprayed once 20cm from your closed eyelid

Warnings

Keep out of sight and reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Before use, please read leaflet for full instructions, warnings and precautions for use.

Ingredients

Liposomal Eye Spray
1mL contains: 10mg Lecithin, 8mg Sodium Chloride, 8mg Ethanol, 0.25mg Vitamin A Palmitate, 0.02mg Vitamin E, Purified water.

Directions

1. When using for the first time, push down the nozzle 3-4 times.
2. Hold 10cm from your closed eyelids.
3. Spray 1-2 times onto the closed eyelids, 3 to 4 times per day.

Spray on closed eyes.

USAGE ADVICE

Discard 6 months after opening. Do not use after expiry date. Only for use on the eyes.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store between 2 and 25°C. Protect from sunlight.

Storage Temperature: between 2 and 25°C.
